Class CheckPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.GamePhase
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.CheckPhase
public class CheckPhase extends GamePhase
Represents the Check Phase of the game, where all player ship boards are validated after the building phase. Players with invalid or disconnected ship structures must repair their boards before proceeding. If all ships are valid, the game immediately transitions to the AdventurePhase. Otherwise, only players with illegal ships are required to repair them. Responsibilities of this phase include:
  • Identifying players with illegal ship configurations
  • Allowing players to repair invalid ship structures
  • Transitioning to the adventure phase when all ships are valid
  • Updating player positions in the ranking

  • Constructor Details

    • CheckPhase

      public CheckPhase(GameContext gameContext)
      Constructs a new CheckPhase. Immediately validates all players' ship boards. Players with invalid ship boards are added to badShipPlayers. If no repairs are needed, the game transitions directly to AdventurePhase.
      Parameters:
      gameContext - the global game context

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Validates all players' ship boards.

      Players with invalid ships are removed from the flight ranking (position set to -1), moved to the end of the player list, and stored in badShipPlayers. If no player has an invalid ship, the game immediately transitions to AdventurePhase.

    • repairShip

      public void repairShip(String username, List<Integer> cardsToEliminateX, List<Integer> cardsToEliminateY)
      Allows a player to repair their ship by destroying specific cards. After the repair attempt, the ship is validated again. If the ship becomes valid, the player is removed from the list of bad ships.
      Overrides:
      repairShip in class GamePhase
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      cardsToEliminateX - list of X coordinates of cards to destroy
      cardsToEliminateY - list of Y coordinates of cards to destroy

    • changePosition

      public void changePosition(String username, int pos)
      Allows a player to change their position in the flight ranking. Only players with valid ship boards may perform this action.
      Overrides:
      changePosition in class GamePhase
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username
      pos - the desired position in the ranking
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the player's ship is still invalid
